metadata.name: Azure Application Credential Modified
metadata.comment: Identifies when a application credential is modified.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('update application - certificates and secrets management'))

output.summary: Identifies when a application credential is modified.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Application credential added may be performed by a system administrator. 2. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. 3. Application credential added from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule. Reference: https://www.cloud-architekt.net/auditing-of-msi-and-service-principals/
